trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around April 22nd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside looking at the sky, thats when i saw something big it was bigger than a commercial plane. the thing in the outside looked green like if it was a force field the inside was like yellow orange it was moving so fast but it didnt make any noise after that it look like shooting star was follwing it. after that i my experince with sleep paralysis is getting worse. i get scared at night. i always see this thing it has red eyes and its color its like yellow orange. it is tall and skinny well you can say thick. I been triying to get help people think that im loosing my mind but im not. this bird comes to my window often at night, thats when i start to have sleep paralysis and i feel like im being dragged, but when i do manage to wake up i feel like there is somebody in the room with me
Summary: it was like a bright star it was green on the outside,yellow orange it was moving so fast i thought it was going to hit the ground it was followed what look like a shooting star
